full_summary:
### Fall Hazard Abatement: Exterior Railing Supply and Installation
#### Tender Announcement

**Government Tender Reference Number:** CB-677-52667818
**Tender Closing Date:** May 28, 2024, 5:00 PM EST
**Publication Date:** May 9, 2024
**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 1, 2024
**Expected Contract End Date:** September 30, 2024
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
**Procurement Category:** CNST

**Tender Description:**

The National Arts Centre (NAC) is soliciting proposals from qualified contractors for the supply and installation of a glazed handrail system at exterior planters on level 2-2 to mitigate fall hazards. Priority will be given to areas without existing barriers, due to their higher risk to the public. The successful contractor will act as the constructor for the duration of the project and be responsible for maintaining the integrity of the roof membrane at the mounting points of the handrail system.

**Key Requirements:**

* The contractor shall provide a quote for the supply and installation of the handrail system
* The contractor shall act as constructor for the duration of the project
* The contractor shall maintain the integrity of the roof membrane at the mounting points of the handrail system
* The contractor shall prioritize areas without existing barriers

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Proposals will be evaluated on technical merit and price
* The combined rating of technical merit and price will be the selection criteria

**Submission Requirements:**

* Proposals must be submitted through the NAC's online portal at https://nac-cna.bonfirehub.ca/
* Registration on the portal is free and mandatory prior to submitting a bid
* Technical support is available at 1-800-354-8010 ext. 2 or through the portal's support page
